title: Asia Cup: India scrape past Oman to win by 21 runs as Arshdeep Singh becomes first Indian to take 100 T20I wicket

description: Arshdeep Singh etched his name in history by becoming the first Indian bowler to claim 100 T20I wickets, achieving the milestone against Oman in the Asia Cup on Friday. His wicket of Vinayak Shukla in their 189-run chase highlighted his consistent performance since his 2022 debut in the format .

title: Bidding adieu to Ashwin, Rohit, Kohli, Pujara: why farewells in team sport can get messy
description: Four of India’s finest cricketers have called time on their Test careers within the space of a few months, without saying goodbye on the field. This has shone a spotlight on how even the greatest team players don’t always get to control when and how they exit a stage they have loved and lived for.

He contributed a quick 26 runs but later dropped a catch, injuring himself in the process and leaving the field. India's innings featured strong performances from Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson, and Tilak Varma, helping them reach a high powerplay score, though Oman's bowlers fought back well.

description: Chrissy Teigen revealed using Ozempic to cope with deep depression following a stillbirth in 2020, noting weight gain exacerbated her grief. While Ozempic aided in weight loss and eased her mental burden, she acknowledged challenges like appetite suppression.

description: The Hindi film 'Homebound,' a story of childhood friends aspiring to be police officers, has been selected as India's official entry for the 2026 Academy Awards in the Best International Feature category. The film received a warm reception at the Toronto Film Festival, securing the second runner-up position for the TIFF People's Choice International Award.

description: Assam mourns the tragic death of Zubeen Garg, the celebrated singer, who passed away at 52 in a scuba diving accident in Singapore. Garg, known for his versatility in Assamese, Hindi, and Bengali music, was in Singapore for the North East Festival.

He cited past links with terrorists and accused Rahul Gandhi of silence. The BJP demanded the Gandhi family apologise.

Defence pact: Saudi Arabia under Pak's nuclear umbrella - will more Gulf nations follow?
description: Saudi Arabia and Pakistan have signed a “Strategic Mutual Defense Agreement,” sparking debate over Riyadh’s potential access to Pakistan’s nuclear shield. While Islamabad initially said nuclear weapons were “not on the radar,” Defence Minister Khawaja Muhammad Asif later told Geo TV that Pakistan’s capabilities “will be made available” to Saudi Arabia under the pact. The deal, seen as a response to rising Gulf insecurity after Israeli strikes in Qatar, revives long-standing speculation about Saudi funding of Pakistan’s nuclear programme.

description: The death of Mohammed Nizamuddin in California sparks controversy. Police claim he attacked his roommate and posed a threat. His family alleges excessive force and delayed notification. Nizamuddin had accused his employer of racial discrimination. The Indian consulate offers assistance. His family seeks government intervention to bring his body back to India for final rites.

title: Colon cancer: THIS medication slashes risk of colorectal cancer recurrence
description: A groundbreaking study reveals that a daily low dose of aspirin can significantly reduce the risk of colorectal cancer recurrence by approximately 55% in patients with specific PI3K pathway mutations. The ALASCCA trial demonstrated that aspirin, when taken for three years post-surgery, offers substantial benefits for those with these genetic alterations.

title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella ‘warns’ employees at company townhall: ‘I’m haunted by one particular…’
description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella expressed his deep concern about the company's future in the age of AI, fearing irrelevance like Digital Equipment Corporation (DEC). He acknowledged employee feedback regarding a colder, more rigid company culture and committed to rebuilding trust and improving empathy within Microsoft.

title: xAI's final exam: Elon Musk tests loyalty; 24 hours to verdict
description: Elon Musk has requested xAI employees to submit detailed one-page summaries of their past accomplishments and future plans, setting a tight deadline amidst company turbulence. This demand follows Musk's pattern of employee performance reviews across his ventures.

title: Serena Williams net worth 2025: tennis legacy, endorsements, ventures
description: Serena Williams, a tennis icon, boasts a net worth of $350 million in 2025. Her wealth comes from tennis wins, endorsements, and business ventures. She supports businesses run by women and people of color through Serena Ventures. Recently, she invested in Unrivaled, a women’s basketball league. Serena also launched a podcast with her sister, Venus.

title: Swift faces backlash after Kelce supports suspended teammate
description: Travis Kelce's decision to wear a "Free 4" shirt in support of suspended teammate Rashee Rice has sparked controversy, drawing criticism from fans who deem it inappropriate given Rice's legal troubles stemming from a high-speed collision. The backlash extends to Taylor Swift, Kelce's fiancée, with some questioning her association with him.
